sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Route, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { LucideAngularModule, BookOpen, Users as UsersIcon, TrendingUp, Trophy } from 'lucide-angular'; import { AssignmentApiService } from '../services/assignment-api.service'; import { AssignmentDto } from '../../models/assignment.model'; import { UserApiService } from '../../features/profile/services/user-api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', standalone: false, templateUrl: './dashboard.html', styleUrl: './dashboard.scss' }) export class Dashboard implements OnInit { currentYear: number = new Date().getFullYear(); totalAssignments: AssignmentDto[] = []; assignmentCount: number = 0; totalUsers: number = 0; constructor(private router: Router, private assignmentApiService: AssignmentApiService, private userApiService: UserApiService) {} async ngOnInit(): Promise { this.totalAssignments = await this.assignmentApiService.getAllAssignments(); this.assignmentCount = this.totalAssignments.length; this.totalUsers = await this.userApiService.getTotalUsersCount(); } navToAssignments(){ this.router.navigate(['/admin-panel/assignments']); } }
